title: iball iTAB Moviez Pro 4 GB RAM 64 GB ROM 10.1 inch with Wi-Fi+4G Tablet (Champagne Gold)

product_specification.Processor Type: SC9863A Octa Core Cortex A55 1.6 GHz + 1.2 GHz
product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet, Earphone, Charger, USB Cable, OTG Cable, Carry Pouch, Cleaning Cloth, User Manual
product_specification.Other Camera Features: Auto Focus Rear and Front Camera
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Bluetooth Support, 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz Dual Band Wireless Connectivity
product_specification.Other Display Features: Full HD LED Backlit Multi Touch IPS Display
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Tablet, 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Binge-watch Device: With the iTAB tablet, you can now watch movies while on the move. With a 25.6-cm (10.1) widescreen, you can now have a comfortable movie-watching experience, anytime!
product_description.Smooth Movie Streaming With Powerful Pro: This lightweight tablet features the Octa-Core ARM CortexTM A55 1.6 GHz + 1.2 GHz processor & GPU IMG8322 graphics card to facilitate continuous streaming of your favourite content.
product_description.Network Support: This tablet offers great connection and it’s compatible with multiple networks, such as VoLTE Support, 4G FDD LTE B1 / B3 / B5 / B8, 3G WCDMA 900 / 2100 MHz, and 2G EDGE / GPRS / GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 MHz.
product_description.Battery Life: Featuring the latest Android 9 Pie operating system and a 7000 mAh battery, you can now binge-watch your favourite movies for long hours.
product_description.Capacitive Multi-touch: This scratch-resistant tablet ensures a quick response, thanks to the 10-point touch screen that performs multi-touch gestures. Moreover, this feature makes it easy to clean and durable.
product_description.Camera: With an 8-megapixel front camera and a 13-megapixel AF rear camera with LED flash, the iTab Moviez Pro can capture scenic shots even in poorly lit conditions.
product_description.Storage: This tablet comes with a 64 GB in-built storage capacity (expandable up to 256 GB) that lets you store your photos, documents and much more.
product_description.Seamless Connectivity: With options like high-speed dual-band Wi-Fi and Bluetooth V5.0, this tablet makes it easy to transfer movies and photos.

review: good value for money. this is only tab with full hd tablet for this budget. its good for watching movie and browsing.. sound in speaker is less in full volume. but we can hear in sound silent place. looks like apple ipad. ITab does all the basic needs.. Good
A good tablet that is available for a very low price. Very useful for office work or students. Not for gaming.
Good display clarity, for entertainment best TAB from IBALL. Camera is not good but ok for a TAB best value for money.

nice tab specially for study..camera is vey bad... if u are a student.. really it's good .I am writing review after 3 days of use...battery backup is good.. charging time take more than 3 hour. please put sim carefully otherwise you will lose... because there is not write properly how to insert sim...be care full specially for sim insertion

Good product, satisfied with this.
Battery life is superb,
Doesn't get so much heat as mobile phones get; it's cool dude.
Camera is average but it's good in this price range tab (Not so good as mobile phones have).
As we experienced processor doesn't work with our speed (used for digital painting and it doesn't respond so quickly with finger & even with stylus pen as expected)
But overall it's Good product in this price (we got it for 12k in offer).
Thanks to flikart for good and fast service.

Everything good. Good configuration at this price range. But Sim card slot is not good, it will allow the Sim card in worng direction and it will stick inside the slot. With the help of safety pin I removed the Sim. Better read the user manual before inserting the Sim and memory card.
Battery backup is average with 4G.

Display is good, viewing experience is good (more than expected)

Battery backup is better than expected


Cons
Accessories like screen guard , tablet cover not available in the market

Camera is average

Review After 15 days of use,
According To Its Price it is Best Tab Ever & Ever.
* Pros *
1) 10.1inch Screen size, Finishing & Display 1920 ×1080p is Appreciated.
2) Processor is fine for multitasking & Office Work etc.
3) Watching Movies & YouTube At 1080P Resolution Is upto the Mark.
4) Battery Backup is too good 1-1.5 Days, though its having 7000mah.
5) 4gb Ram & 64gb Memory + expandable memory is More than enough.
* Cons. *
1) charging is bit slow 5V 2A charger provided.
2) Sim card tray is not easy task , you have to put sim into medium size sim adapter.
3) You Can Run Pubg on Low graphic Setting,bit laggy bcuz as You Know processor its not heavy.
One of the best product that I have bought from Flipkart,It looks stunning and works fabulous .Camera quality is too good.Display and battery life works perfect Good decision to buy this product

It is very difficult to take out the SIM card once inserted in this tab. SIM card flap was very delicate and broke on the first day itself. There is no marking/design given on the SIM and memory card slot as to in which direction the memory card is to be inserted. If they would have given small slip-in-tray to support sim n memory card, it would have been better as these are given in all mobile phones. No Mobile sim is supported in this device it seems.

It is very difficult to take out the SIM card once inserted in this tab. SIM card flap was very delicate and broke on the first day itself. There is no marking/design given on the SIM and memory card slot as to in which direction the memory card is to be inserted. If they would have given small slip-in-tray to support sim n memory card, it would have been better as these are given in all mobile phones. No Mobile sim is supported in this device it seems.

tablet display is good ,it support hd (9/10) .about battery is quit good it can stand half of day by continuous use .(7/10),.about camera quality it os not good ,it donot have even image stabilization ,which is present on other tablet of this price.(5/10).about performance it donot support pubg even in low graphic. it lag a lot .(6/10) .overall it is nice only if u need for reading and movie purouses.

Performance is awesome. Display Is good , sound is average but clear and camera poor but not much needed for a tab . Battery on first two days wasn’t satisfactory but then I used power saving options nd reduced brightness to lowest . Moreover pls use iball cable nd adapter to charge , else it won’t give good result .

After One week of use, The battery performance has actually improved. Not sure how, First two days battery draining was so worst, but now its working like a pro, battery became efficient. So ppl compaining of draining issue. Please charge using Iball adapter and cable only to 100 percent and use it for two days , then you would see battery draining improves over the time

Speakers are the most disappointing part of this gadget. Very low sound. Display is good. Performance is average for the price. Build quality is good except the sim and storage card slors. Both camera are of very low quality. Would not recommend this device for people looking for good sound or camera. Overall 6/10 rating. Rating is increased only due to the price of the product as the value for money is OK.
This is really value for money product. Good gaming experience, at least what my son says... Good battery backup with average camera quality. Good speakers with calling facility.
It is excellent product at this range. I feel superior with it and it also valued money over all best products by i-ball.

Awesome tablet for less than 15 k.
Pros.
1. awesome display
2. Decent camera ( enough for video calling)
3. SIM option
4. Expandable storage
5. Battery backup
6. Good earphones along with Tab

Cons.
1. Speaker volume is less

Performance is good but display quality and overall looking could be improved. also we face a common problem of not finding suitable tempered glass and back cover for this device. accessories like back cover temperred glass should be available at iball store or partner store.

Further, SIM slot quality is not standard...after changing sim 5-7 times sim is not working..

Camera specs looks decent for video call and video recording, and it does the job
Jio data is faster compared to an old Redmi phone
YouTube and streaming is faster in both data and WiFi
overall performance is more than satisfactory even after installing 15-20 apps which I don't keep in my primary phone
Screen quality is sharp even keeping brightness at the lowest
Battery backup looks better, used for 2 days with existing battery charge at the time of delivery

Few cons,
Speaker is low, however good for quick play in WhatsApp or FB or YouTube
SIM and Card tray is too complicated, sim got stuck first and took out with great difficulty
since it's a push in tray read user guide before inserting sim and SD card to avoid hassle

overall it will be a satisfactory buy, Go for it if you are looking for a budget tablet.

Nice tablet for price. Android os is ok. Not a lot of customisation. Performance is good. Note: I mostly use it for YouTube and movies and productivity for my learning. I do not play games. Storage is good as the memory card space can be directly combined with internal storage. Display is good. Better than a 1080p laptop. Battery is excellent. Screen on time is around 8-9 hours on full charge. Lasts for 2 days on moderate use. I use greenify to have better battery. Cases available does not feel good. The drawback is the audio. Speakers are not good . I always use earphones on this tablet and you cannot use a cheap earphones.
Excellent I ball itab nice look good battery hd screen amazing product
The camera is not much good but the tab is great. it's features are ossom and we love it sound quality is very nice and display to
good reliable and dependable good to watch movies and tv, worth its price. you cannot ask more for this price.

This product is value for money and I’ve given it a five star primarily from that point of view. Though it takes time to charge if less than 10%, however it holds charge for decent amount of time, good enough if one’s away from a power source. The brightness I feel is on the higher side even when kept to a minimum. Also, the speaker sound is on the lower side. However, I’ve also noticed that the volume is loud when viewing Tatasky or listening to FM. This indicates that there might be a software to hardware interface issue which if optimised will deliver higher sound. Insertion of memory card isn’t a problem. It has to be done in a deliberate manner. Screen is good & delivers crisp picture. I was facing an issue all of a sudden with the powering up of the device with pressing of the power button. However, after inserting a sim card I haven’t faced the problem. If one is interested in a budget tab without compromising on overall performance, then this would definitely be a good choice. And lastly, thanks Flipkart for safely delivering the product.

Hi All,

I am writing this review after using this tablet for a month. This tablet is a great value for money for sure because you could not get a Full HD Display with 4GB Ram at this price point. Plus this tab has Bigger battery (7000mah), 4G and Wi-Fi with good build quality(Metal back) and comes with Android Pie (9).

The cons for this tablet in my opinion is it's low powered processor(Which could handle most of apps and okay for a tablet at this price range), Double tap to wake up screen, Low speaker volume.

Regards,
Tony

pros.7000 mAh Battery: This tablet features a 7000 mAh battery which is very powerful and provides an excellent backup lasting long hours.
pros.Performance: The Octa-Core ARM CortexTM A55 1.6 GHz + 1.2 GHz processor is good enough to provide seamless experience for day to day tasks.
pros.Full HD display: The 25.65 cm (10.1 inch) Full HD display is good and provides a comfortable viewing experience.

cons.Camera: The 13MP rear camera and 8MP front camera combination is very poor, which is expected as this tablet is not built for photography.
cons.Sound quality: The dual stereo speakers of this tablet gives an average audio quality and is not upto the mark.

summary.verdict: The iball iTAB Moviez Pro is a decent purchase at this price segment and is good for media consumption.
summary.Additional Information: Split screen, Comes with earphones, Supports 4G.
